review: Everything and more than I expected. Between this and Netflix I reduced my cable service saving me $75/month. Great product!!!
author: Paul Ritzcovan

review: Very happy I bought it. IT does a lot more than it said it does
author: Thomas D.

review: Got it as a Xmas gift last year and I love it. Always something good on to watch and as a prime member u get a great selection of shows and movies as well. No problems so far and connects to home wifi easily and set up took less than 10 min.
author: Cory

review: its good, but VERY misleading, as it is NOT wireless.
author: Anne Martello

review: Very confusing. Poor instructions.  Not all icons visible. Too many additional charges.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Small, compact...perfect for my travel needs!
author: Raul

review: My girlfriend Love it.!!! So now she can watch movies amzon prime, unfurtunally not all the movies are available with prime wich its suck but she like it......
author: Mario Lopez

review: I'm a little disappointed as I did not expect to have to pay for anything and everything available on the Firestick.It  seems that it isthe same as On Demand and Netflix which I already have.I plan to cancel my Netflix subscription and stream movies with Firestick.I guess I did not do enough home work and did not completely understand the function of Firestick.
author: William P. Gorman
